text: cng klaw theid muhammad phwk than mi hen dxk hrux sing thi phwk than wingwxn khx xun ca kxallxhˌ cng sædng hı kha hen si wa phwk man di srang xari nı phændin ni hrux wa phwk man mi swn rwm nı (kar srang) chan fa thanghlay cng na khamphir kxn hna ni ma hı kha du si hrux cng sædng rxngrxy hæng khwam ru (thi pen hlakthan yunyan nı kar ni) hak phwk than pen phu suxsaty cring
